DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate efficacy amifostine enhance hematopoietic recovery follow cyclophosphamide , etoposide , cisplatin therapy patient hematologic malignancy adult solid tumor . OUTLINE : This open label study . Patients receive intravenous amifostine 15 minute daily 30 minute prior high dose chemotherapy day 0-2 . Cyclophosphamide administer 3 hour day 0 1 , intravenous etoposide 4 hour day 0 , 1 , 2 , cisplatin 4 hour day 0 , 1 , 2 . All patient receive sargramostim ( GM-CSF ) begin day 4 . Patients receive maximum 2 course treatment ( 35-42 day chemotherapy course ) . Patients follow 1-5 month treatment . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 20 patient accrue study within 12 month .
